sections.text:
61-212.Water divisions; denomination.

The State of Nebraska is hereby divided into two water divisions, denominated water division No. 1 and water division No. 2, respectively.

SourceLaws 1895, c. 69, § 1, p. 244;R.S.1913, § 3378;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 1, § 10, p. 833;C.S.1922, § 8415;C.S.1929, § 46-510;R.S.1943, § 46-215;R.S.1943, (1998), § 46-215;Laws 2000, LB 900, § 12.

Annotations

For administrative purposes, state is divided into two water divisions. Ainsworth Irr. Dist. v. Bejot, 170 Neb. 257, 102 N.W.2d 416 (1960).
